org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io

Class ExternalProcessInputSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.io.GenericInputSplit
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io.ExternalProcessInputSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplit, org.apache.flink.core.io.IOReadableWritable

    public class ExternalProcessInputSplit
extends org.apache.flink.core.io.GenericInputSplit
    The ExternalProcessInputSplit contains all informations for InputFormat that read their data from external processes. Each parallel instance of an InputFormat starts an external process and reads its output. The command to start the external process must be executable on all nodes.
    See Also:
    ExternalProcessInputFormat, ExternalProcessFixedLengthInputFormat
